name: 杨凯辉
bio_zh:
我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院的二年级（2024年-至今）博士研究生，师从张鼎文教授。

我的研究兴趣包括医学图像、AI4Health和多模态处理。
bio_en:
I am currently a second-year (2024-Now) Ph. D. student in the School of Automation at Northwestern Polytechnical University (NPU), supervision by Prof. Dingwen Zhang. 

My research interests include Medical Imaging, AI4Health, and Multimodal Processing.
